name: Crash To Desktop
description:
Overview:

For this week, I decided to experiment with chromatic aberration as a visual feedback element (ala screen shake). Turns out, it looks really cool. Anyway, I couldn't decide whether I wanted to make a stealth game (ex Light) or action (ex Hotline Miami), so it ended up being a mix. Hack, shoot, and stealth your way to victory.

Features:

  • Destructible terrain
  • Chromatic aberration
  • At least one scheming villain

Controls:

[WASD] - Move

[E] - Hack

[Mouse] - Shoot

[Shift] - Restart Room

A Game a Week [Week 13]:

This game is my thirteenth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang) or on my website (pixelmancer.io). Stay tuned!
